channel.title: News on Asterisk, and other worldly endeavours
channel.description: Recent content in News on Asterisk, and other worldly endeavours

item.title: Back from Vacation!
item.description: Just a quick note letting you know I’m back from vacation! Just been working on catching up on a few things, and have started working on a new article. It will be focusing on how to convert from using AgentCallbackLogin() to using the AddQueueMember() method of dynamically adding members to queues. Since AgentCallbackLogin() has been removed from Asterisk 1.6.0 and beyond, you’ll need to use the AddQueueMember() method. Luckily, all the tools we need to use it on Asterisk 1.
